name: cornwall
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in southwestern England: They always went either to Devon or Cornwall for their holidays. The economy of Cornwall is still heavily reliant on traditional industries such as fishing, farming, and tourism.
More examplesFewer examplesGrandage grew up in Penzance, Cornwall. His uncle lived in Cornwall for 20 years.The tunnels in Cornwall's oldest tin mine, South Crofty near Camborne, run for a total of 160 km.
